Stacy was wearing a red skirt that fell to her knees, a white blouse and a pair of sandals. They were ill-fitting and crudely made, looking like the clothes a doll would wear. This was because Stacy was only two inches tall. She had shoulder-length blonde hair, which a friend cut with a pair of nail scissors, and fair skin. She also had a rounded chin, blue eyes and a straight, greek nose, though she was so small that few people ever noticed these details.

The friend and sometime lover who held Stacy in the palm of her hand was an exception to this. Dana had fiery red hair in a pixie cut. Her large, grass green eyes complimented her high cheekbones, cute, snub nose and small, pouty mouth. Her pale cheeks and nose had a dusting of freckles. She was wearing a blue t-shirt, black jeans and a pair of old sneakers; she was a fairly carefree and lazy girl. She was five foot four with A cup breasts and a slim waist.

Dana and Stacy had been friends since kindergarten. Dana had always been careful and caring with Stacy, and had been Stacy’s babysitter whenever her parents had needed to go out. The redhead was always careful where she stepped or sat and absolutely adored Stacy. The feeling was mutual. Because of her size, Stacy could easily be crushed by someone careless. While she was remarkable resilient for someone her size, she was not invincible. Stacy was small because of a genetic defect called Brown’s Condition. It wasn’t known if there were any side effects because most people with it didn’t survive to adulthood. Dana was the reason Stacy had survived.

After they had left school, the two had moved to the city to go to university. They shared an apartment, with Dana working as a model and Stacy letting med students study her to pay rent. The two had gone out tonight as a celebration; they had both found out their results from last year’s exams and had passed with flying colours.

Suddenly, the deafening cry of dozens of screaming patrons nearly caused his ear drums to burst, followed by some def leppard music blaring in the background as the next dancer(s) began to make their entrance on stage, The very stage he was on!

"Holy shit!!!" you cry out! The gigantic figure(s) appear!

"Guys and Gals, give a warm welcome to our newest dancer(s)!" The DJ announces. Slowly turning your head over your shoulders, you hear the name of the Dancer as she approaches you on stage,
132.title: Mant on the dance floor

choices: Jordan, a tall 25 year old brunette bisexual female patron.
Selena, a 22 year old Latina girl who is one of the dancers, getting off work.
Kumi, the strip bar manager/owner, a 50 something year old Japanese woman.
133.content:
((Sorry, author, I am going to make Tyler 1/2 tall in this branch. Feel free to edit or delete. I just do not think a 2 inch tall person would be believable for an unaware scenario.))

Tyler was stuck in a gooey, rancid smelling substance. It almost had the texture of shaving cream, but much thicker.

"Ugh.....What the hell?!" Tyler struggled, but barely made any progress getting around. He was hopelessly stuck. He observed his surroundings a bit more....was that an olive the size a monster truck tire? Wait, are those Jalapenos, tomatoes, lettuce???

Just then, a massive shadow cast over him. Tyler gasped in awe the sight before him, a giant! It was also at this point, he finally figured out where he was at. A big plate of Nachos!

His eyes focusing a little better now, he was able to make out the person that may be eating him up now. It was,
133.title: Nachos

14.content:
Tyler is out for the night with the guys, he is having the time of his life trying out the hottest strip club in the town. After a couple drinks, Tyler begins to feel faint and tells the guys he thinks he will be heading home soon. 10 minutes pass and he feels really dizzy and walks around aimlessly around the strip club until he passes out. A little while after Tyler wakes up and tries to get his footing. all of a sudden he realises he is still at the strip club except everything is really big he must only 2 inches tall at the most. But where is he standing?

(this is where the story will really start to take off. sorry for the repetition)
14.title: Tyler (aware)

choices: To Place You In Her Butt Crack!
To leave you on the couch?
To give you to the woman?
141.content: You think your still drunk or asleep because it's impossible to be two inches. You soon start panicking as you pinch yourself and aren't awake. You calm yourself down over and over that the guys probably put something in your drink as a joke. While your panicking one of the strippers is walking over to the couch! You see a huge shadow over you and your eyes open up wide. She was in fishnet leggins and a one piece that shows off her big butt! She had a large rear and it was hypnotizing you. She started to shake it back and forth and you watched as her cheeks just bounce and bounce. The leggings looked like they couldn't hold her buttocks and were about to rip. You take a seat and enjoy the show. It's definatly a dream no man ever gets the chance to watch a giantess stripper for free also!! After a minute she turns her head with a big smirk and looses her footing. She accidently fell and her titanic rear came down on you. If it wasn't a dream you'd run but it is so you just embraced as her big booty came down. Sadly for you it's reality and it took a ton of ass just to let you know. Your body was flat and crushed under her lovely ass. Her warm cheeks on top of you just smothering you. Weird part was you feel the pain of being sat on but your alive. She gets up and sits her big rump next to you. "So little one how you like my ass? Too tired to talk well don't worry that last drink of yours turned your body to something more durable to survive such treatment. Your lucky actually now you get to feel the full experience of my ass and live to feel it over and over again!" you looked at her confused why she did this to you but it was true your alive but you didn't think you wanted to feel the pain of her crushing you. She got up again and sat her rump back on you. She grinded you and bounced on you over and over. She remained sitting on you for an hour as she enjoyed her break. Afterwards she was called by some woman to come back on stage."Steph cmon their chanting out there for you" She got up and saw you stuck to the couch. She starts to think where to keep you at. She peels you off and decides...
141.title: The Couch (butt crush)

info.brief_description: Your a guy or girl shrunk at a female strip club, will they notice you? 500GPs per add
info.description:
First thing you should know is i will reward up too 500 GP points to anyone who adds a chapter. basically i like to award 100 GPs per 1000 characters.

In this Giantess interactive you are a guy or girl by the names of Tyler and Stacy, you are at a strip club on a friday night when all of a sudden you shrink,

just a few suggestions

i would like to keep this a butt crush story but if you would like to go down any other path i will give you that option at the beginning. Just try not to mix it up in the story line.

also it is a third person narrative story with maybe a little first person here and there.

try to keep the story giantess on guy or giantess on girl (i know they're are guys at strip clubs but don't have any interactions with them)

also try to keep the characters at the strip club if they venture outside the club try to get them back there in a couple of chapters.

i totally encourage pictures especially if you add characters, you don't have to, but if it helps the imagination go for it i won't delete them

One last thing write good chapters and have fun with it.
